original_title: Kau, Rabu, dan Perkara2 Sepintas Lalu
overview: Rhun, a well-known novelist, must finish his latest novel soon. Ajeng was chosen by a publisher to read the script before the novel was declared finished. Rhun is captivated by her. But in the end, the woman stopped coming.
title: Kau, Rabu, dan Perkara2 Sepintas Lalu
